import React from 'react' import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css'; import axios from 'axios' const Write = () => { const [value, setValue] = React.useState(''); const [title, setTitle] = React.useState(''); const [file, setFile] = React.useState(null); const [cat, setCat] = React.useState(""); const upload = async ()=> { try{ const formData = new FormData() formData.append('file', file) const res = await axios.post('/upload') }catch(err){ console.log(err) } } const handleClick = async e => { e.preventDefault(); const newPost = { title, desc: value, img: file, cat } console.log(newPost) } console.log(value) return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}>
